data.name: Antidote
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

A devastating flesh-eating plague has wiped out most of the Earth’s population. In the aftermath of the pandemic, huge swaths of the world are mostly empty - inhabited by solitary survivors and little else. With this grim landscape as a background, Matthew and Hannah travel together through the desolation, searching for the remainders of Matthew’s family. Their journey takes a horrific turn when Matthew suddenly becomes infected by the disease. They take shelter in the basement of an abandoned farmhouse, and Hannah tends to Matthew as he grows increasingly ill. In the hopes that he can survive the ordeal, Hannah administers a drug she has scavenged. This drug has the potential to be effective against the disease – but it is almost certain to cause madness. Confined to the basement, Matthew descends into insanity as Hannah attempts to care for his rapidly deteriorating body. But the disease isn’t their only foe; a crazed infected woman stalks them outside the house, and Hannah makes a shocking discovery in the adjacent barn. When a mysterious and un-infected stranger appears, promising the key to survival, Hannah is presented with an impossible choice. Forced to act, she takes matters into her own hands, and fights desperately to save Matthew, and herself.

data.short_description: In a post-apocalyptic plague-ridden world, a man and woman face unimaginable horrors when he suddenly becomes infected, and the only possible cure slowly drives him mad.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
